name: Alien Abduction
effect:
Gametext - Most CUNNING Away Team member (owner's choice if tie) is held captive by aliens until mission completed OR 3 Leadership present.
Reason - Removed the word 'captive' to make it clear it's not a capture-related card.

name: Amanda Rogers
effect:
Gametext - Nullifies any one Interrupt card just played (except Kevin Uxbridge or another Amanda Rogers) OR any one artifact other card just played as an Interrupt card. {0}
Reason - Added point box so you can't reuse.

name: Anti-Time Anomaly
effect:
Gametext - Plays on table. Kills literally ALL personnel on table in play (both players' cards) at the end of your third full turn, unless anti-time anomaly destroyed first.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Armus - Skin of Evil
effect:
A malevolent being was formed when the inhabitants of Vagra II rid themselves of all the evil they had inside.
Errata Reason - ... no idea why they bothered with this one. (Beta version is corrected)

name: Atmospheric Ionization
effect:
Gametext - Plays crosswise on any planet location. Maximum of three personnel per turn can be beamed up or down at this location. (Unique.)
Reason - Nerf. Made it unique.

name: Auto-Destruct Sequence
effect:
Gametext - Plays on one of your own ships. Ship self-destructs at end of your turn. Explosion damages all other ships at same location that which have SHIELDS<8.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Birth of "Junior"
effect:
Gametext - Place on ship. Range reduced by 1 each turn until 3 ENGINEER aboard which discards "Junior" and restores range. If RANGE=0, ship is destroyed. End of each turn, RANGE reduced by 1; if reduced to 0, ship destroyed. Nullify with 3 ENGINEER.
Reason - No functional changes. Modernized game text for readability.

name: Borg Ship
effect:
Icon Bar - Added [Self]
Gametext - Self-controlling ship (WEAPONS=24, SHIELDS=24). Start here. Attacks everything. End of every turn, moves 1 card toward and off spaceline's long end. Destroy for bonus. {45} Place at furthest spaceline end. End of every turn: Attacks all ships, then moves. Worth points if destroyed in battle. {45}
Reason - Nerf (so encountering ship wouldn't go poof), and made it a self-controlled.

name: Bynars Weapon Enhancement
effect:
Gametext - Plays on table. Bynars enhance each of your ship's ship. Ship is WEAPONS +2. (Cumulative.)
Reason - Nerf - so it doesn't affect every ship you have.

name: Cloaked Mission
effect:
Lore - Romulus System Region • Romulus: Secretly escort covert operatives to the Romulan homeworld.
Reason - Early region mission.

name: Covert Installation
effect:
Lore - Neutral Zone Region • Devora: Build hidden monitoring station in the Neutral Zone.
Reason - Early region mission.

name: Disruptor Overload
effect:
Gametext - Plays on any ship or Away Team. One Equipment card OR one artifact played as an Equipment card, is destroyed at that location Where present, destroys one Equipment card or one card used as an Equipment card (random selection).
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Distortion Field
effect:
Gametext - Plays crosswise face up on any planet location. On each of your turns, flip card over. While face up, prevents all any beam down/up here unless pattern enhancers in play. beaming down/up here. (Unique.)
Reason - Nerf. Made it unique.

name: Distortion of Space/Time Continuum
effect:
Gametext - Any one ship and its Away Team may immediately make another move. Plays on any ship. "Unstops" ship, crew, and ship's Away Teams and restores any of this turn's RANGE already used by that ship.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Emergency Transporter Armbands
effect:
Gametext - Beam your Personnel up or down at any time, even except during a dilemma (unless specifically permitted). May be used during battle before the winner is determined.
Reason - Nerf. Can't escape dilemmas unless the dilemma says you can.

name: Evacuation
effect:
Requirements - Diplomacy x3 + Strength STRENGTH >35
Reason - Typo (Strength to STRENGTH)

name: Explore Typhone Expanse
effect:
Title - Explore Typhone Typhon Expanse
Lore - Typhone Typhon Expanse: Trace time distortion reported in this desolate region.
Reason - Typo - spelled Typhon 'Typhone'.

name: Federation
effect:
Title - Federation Outpost - added [Univ]
Gametext - Seed one if playing Federation OR build later at any location where you have a Federation ENGINEER is present.
Reason - Outpost cleanup.

name: Female's Love Interest
effect:
Gametext - Female Away Team member (random selection) runs off with lover to furthest planet, where she remains. Can be rescued later. Discard dilemma.
Reason - No functional changes, minor rewording.

name: Full Planet Scan
effect:
Gametext - Glance at the Dilemma and Artifact all seed cards located under one planet mission for twenty seconds.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Giusti
effect:
Lore - Ensign Giusti is representative of staff officers in Starfleet. Served at the Ops consol console aboard the U.S.S. Enterprise in 2370.
Reason - Typo in lore.

name: Holo-projectors
effect:
Gametext - Plays on table. This technology allows your holographic re-creations to be projected and used on any of your ships or Away Teams. (Immune to Kevin Uxbridge.) a planet mission. [Holo] cards may exist on this planet.
Reason - Nerf. Now only works on a single planet.

name: I.K.C. Bortas
effect:
Lore - Gowron's flagship Flagship commanded by Gowron during the Klingon Civil War of 2367-68. Lieutenant Worf briefly served aboard as a weapons officer.
Reason - Cleaned up lore to make it clear that Gowron's captain of this ship.

name: Iconia Investigation
effect:
Lore - Neutral Zone Region • Iconia: Investigate Federation incursion in the Neutral Zone.
Reason - Early region mission.

name: Investigate "Shattered Space"
effect:
Lore - Neutral Zone Region • Near Neutral Zone: Study fragments of distorted space/time reported in this sector.
Reason - Early region mission.

name: Investigate Sighting
effect:
Lore - Beta Stromgen Stromgren: Investigate sighting of Gomtuu, an interstellar creature code-named, Tin Man.
Reason - Typo - wrong location name.

name: Investigate Time Continuum
effect:
Lore - Devidia Devidia II: Trace mysterious time-traveling aliens living in a parallel time continuum.
Reason - Typo - wrong location name.

name: Kevin Uxbridge
effect:
Gametext - Nullifies any one Event card in play (except for Treaty cards) OR any one artifact in play other card played as an Event card. (Immune to Amanda Rogers.) {0}
Reason - Nerf. Added point box so you can't recycle used Kevin.

name: Khitomer Research
effect:
Attemptable - Added [Kli]
Reason - For some reason, didn't say Klingons could attempt.

name: Klingon
effect:
Title - Klingon Outpost - added [Univ]
Gametext - Seed one if playing Klingon OR build later at any location where you have a Klingon ENGINEER is present.
Reason - Outpost cleanup.

name: Loss of Orbital Stability
effect:
Gametext - Plays on any ship at a planet location orbiting a planet. Ship can't move for one turn. Also, ship is destroyed at end of next turn unless SHIELDS>4. Discard after use. has NO RANGE until end of turn, and is destroyed at end of its owner's next turn unless SHIELDS>4; then discard interrupt.
Reason - Changed to not be a response to movement.

name: Male's Love Interest
effect:
Gametext - Male Away Team member (random selection) runs off with lover to furthest planet, where he remains. Can be rescued later. Discard dilemma.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Mendon
effect:
Lore - Ensign Mendon is a Benzite male representative of science specialist specialists within Starfleet. Served aboard the U.S.S. Enterprise in 2365. Looks like Mordock.
Reason - Typo in lore.

name: Menthar Booby Trap
effect:
Gametext - Place on ship; it cannot move. Unless MEDICAL present, one crew member killed (random selection). Ship can't move until 2 ENGINEER aboard. Discard with 2 ENGINEER aboard.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Metaphasic Shields
effect:
Gametext - Plays on table. New technology enhances each of your ship's SHIELDS +2 for each SCIENCE aboard. (Cumulative.) Plays on your ship. SHIELDS +2 for each SCIENCE classification personnel aboard.
Reason - Nerf. Now only affects one ship, and only for classifications.

name: Nutational Shields
effect:
Gametext - Plays on table. New technology enhances each of your ship's SHIELDS +2 for each ENGINEER aboard. (Cumulative.) Plays on your ship. SHIELDS +2 for each ENGINEER classification personnel aboard.
Reason - Nerf. Now only affects one ship, and only for classifications.

name: Phased Matter
effect:
Gametext - Away Team is split into two Away Teams (your choice). Only the smaller team may beam up until ENGINEER and SCIENCE present. Larger team is phased and cannot beam until cured by ENGINEER and SCIENCE in another Away Team on planet.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Q
effect:
Gametext - If Unless 2 Leadership and INTEGRITY>60, discard all dilemmas here. Otherwise, Q allows opponent to rearrange spaceline locations. stops crew or Away Team. Discard dilemma.
Reason - Massive nerf which was needed - the Q dilemma was way way way too powerful.

name: Q2
effect:
Gametext - Nullifies any Amanda Rogers OR Kevin Uxbridge just played, OR nullifies any Q-related dilemma. {0}
Reason - Nerf. Point box prevents recycling.

name: Radioactive Garbage Scow
effect:
Gametext - Place on spaceline here. Mission cannot be done attempted where present. Ship with Tractor Beam and 2 ENGINEER can tow barge to a different location. scow.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Red Alert!
effect:
Gametext - Plays on table. Allows you to play as many In place of your normal card play, you may report for duty any number of Ship, Personnel, and Equipment cards as desired each turn.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: REM Fatigue Hallucinations
effect:
Gametext - No one aboard can dream. Entire crew or Away Team dies in three of your full turns unless 3 MEDICAL present OR ship returns to outpost first. {5}
Reason - No functional change, removed unneeded 'fluff' from gametext.

name: Romulan
effect:
Title - Romulan Outpost - added [Univ]
Gametext - Seed one if playing Romulan OR build later at any location where you have a Romulan ENGINEER is present.
Reason - Outpost cleanup.

name: Scan
effect:
Gametext - Glance at the Dilemma and Artifact all seed cards located under one space mission for twenty seconds.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: T'Pan
effect:
Gametext - [SD] SCIENCE [SD] Mindmeld
Reason - Typo - She should've had Mindmeld to begin with.

name: Tarellian Plague Ship
effect:
Gametext - All ship's Entire crew immediately dies from plague unless MEDICAL volunteers to permanently beam over "beams over" (discarded) to Tarellians. Discard dilemma. {5}
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Temporal Rift
effect:
Icon Bar - Added [Countdown: 2]
Gametext - Plays on your ship. Ship disappears and must reappear here after two of your full turns. Discard interrupt after reappearance. When countdown expires, ship reappears here.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: The Juggler
effect:
Icon Bar - Added [Referee]
Reason - Added Ref from Q the Ref.
Lore - The Juggler hosted Lwaxanna Lwaxana Troi and Alexamder Rozhenko's visit to the Parallax Colony, all the time juggling his three words.

name: Toral
effect:
Lore - Illegitimate son of Duras. Claimed leadership position on the High Council at bidding of half Duras' sisters, Lursa and B'Etor.
Reason - Typo in lore.

name: Tsiolkovsky Infection
effect:
Gametext - Place aboard ship. It is now infected. Mission can continue continues, but all personnel, while aboard, lose their first-listed skill. Cure with 3 MEDICAL to discard. (Not cumulative.)
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Vulcan Mindmeld
effect:
Gametext - Allows all Mindmeld personnel, at one location, to add to their skills. For one turn, add all of the skills of another personnel who is present. Plays at any location. Each of your Mindmeld personnel there may select another of your personnel present and add that personnel's skills to their own until end of turn.
Reason - No functional change, cleaned up gametext.

name: Wesley Crusher
effect:
Lore - Ensign Wesley Crusher was a child prodigy. Protege' Protégé of the Traveler. Son of Dr. Beverly Crusher. Saved the U.S.S. Enterprise 3 1/2 times as a teenager.
Reason - Typo in lore.

name: Wind Dancer
effect:
Gametext - To get past, Lwaxanna Lwaxana Troi must be present OR at least one Away Team member must have: Youth OR Music OR STRENGTH>9.
Reason - Typo on Lwaxana's name.

name: Wormhole
effect:
Gametext - Requires two wormholes. Play one on any ship just as it begins to move. Play the other where the ship immediately emerges. Discard wormholes. on your ship. Play the other at any location. Ship relocates to that location (and then is "stopped").
Reason - Nerf. Can't worm enemy ships.
